#### Phenomenological models of annual plant competition  

\vspace{-4em}
\begin{equation} \label{eq1}
\begin{split}
N_{i,t+1} = sN_{i, t}(1-g) + gN_{i,t}\lambda_i (1 + \sum_{j = 1}^n \alpha_{ij}g_jN_{j,t})^{\tau_i}
\end{split}
\end{equation}

\vspace{-4em}
\begin{equation} \label{eq2}
\begin{split}
N_{i,t+1} = sN_{i, t}(1-g) + gN_{i,t}\frac{ \lambda_i }{ (1 + \sum_{j = 1}^n[g_jN_{j,t}]^{\eta_j}) }
\end{split}
\end{equation}
